plan.text: Set up a Google Sheets spreadsheet to track invoices
Create an email template for polite reminders
Set up a Google Apps Script to automate the process
Schedule the script to run every weekday at 10am
Test the automation to ensure it works correctly

questions.label: Do you already have a Google Sheets spreadsheet for tracking invoices?
Do you have an existing email template for invoice reminders?

discoveries.title: Google Apps Script knowledge may be required
Proper invoice data organization in Google Sheets is crucial

pipelines.title: Set up invoice reminder automation
steps: Create or update Google Sheets for invoice tracking
Write Google Apps Script for automation
Set up time-based trigger for script execution
Test and refine the automation process
